verses.roman:
miśrera āgamana rāye sevaka kahilā
śīghra rāmānanda tabe sabhāte āilā

synonyms: miśrera—of Pradyumna Miśra; āgamana—arrival; rāye—to Rāmānanda Rāya; sevaka kahilā—the servant informed; śīghra—very soon; rāmānanda—Rāmānanda Rāya; tabe—thereupon; sabhāte āilā—came to the assembly room.
translation: When the servant informed Rāmānanda Rāya of Pradyumna Miśra's arrival, Rāmānanda Rāya immediately went to the assembly room.
